game: Swap clothes with the person to your right and wear them for the next two rounds.
Never Have I Ever: Each player takes a turn saying something they've never done. Anyone who has done that thing takes a drink.
Call your crush and sing a romantic song to them.
What's your favorite guilty pleasure TV show?
Do a handstand for as long as you can, or take a drink if you can't.
Charades: Act out a word or phrase without speaking, and other players guess what it is. If they guess correctly, you drink; if they're wrong, they drink.
What's your most embarrassing childhood memory?
21 Questions: One player thinks of something, and others take turns asking yes-or-no questions to guess what it is. Each wrong questioner drinks.
If you could travel back in time, which historical era would you visit?
Two Truths and a Lie: Share two truths and one lie about yourself. Other players guess which statement is the lie. If they guess wrong, they drink.
Swap clothes with the person to your left and wear them for the next two rounds.
If you could have any superpower, what would it be and why?
Send a text to your ex and say something outrageous.
What's the most unusual food you've ever eaten?
Call a random contact in your phone and tell them a secret.
